item.title: $ sudo make my summer thrilling
item.description: It’s been a while since I posted or blogged about something, and the situation looks still the same… this year will be one of the most tragic and hard-hitting for all of us, I don’t want to stretch over the current situation so let’s jump straight on to my experience with ongoing semester. The worst thing for me, personally is the ongoing semester which is taking forever to end. I guess this semester is bad for everyone from students to professors as well as parents.
